definition[0]: to turn the switch on a machine such as an oven, radio etc so that it produces less heat, sound etc
example[0]: Can you turn the TV down? I’m trying to work.
definition[1]: to refuse an offer, request, or invitation
example[1]: They offered her the job but she turned it down.
example[2]: I’m not going to turn down an invitation to go to New York!
example[3]: Josie’s already turned him down (=refused his offer of marriage).
definition[2]: to refuse an offer or request
example[4]: He turned down a job at an investment bank.
definition[3]: if an economy etc turns down, the level of activity etc falls, companies become less profitable etc
example[5]: When the economy turns down, the aerospace industry suffers too, however exciting the projects.
